visualizations.title: Mandi Price Forecast with Historical Context
visualizations.description: Comprehensive forecast plot showing historical prices, test set predictions, and future forecasts with clear separation between data types.

visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Prices (Test Set)
visualizations.description: Scatter plot comparing actual vs predicted prices in the test set with perfect prediction reference line.

visualizations.title: Residuals Analysis
visualizations.description: Residuals analysis showing distribution and relationship with actual prices in the test set.

insights: Model achieves 82.3% variance explained (R²=0.8234) with 28.5% MAPE. Residuals show positive bias and 4.2% outliers.
data.summary: Model demonstrates moderate forecasting capability with historical alignment but requires caution due to residual bias and error margins.
data.task_answer: The model can forecast mandi prices with moderate accuracy (R²=0.8234), but predictions have significant margin of error (28.5% MAPE). Historical patterns show strong alignment, but future forecasts should be interpreted with caution due to residual bias and non-Gaussian error distribution.
